title: Enter Second Murderer
description: Librarian's note: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B00572BAI2.'The Gruesome Convent Murders'Prime suspects are a fanatical nun, an aristocratic hermit and a public schoolboy in a chronicle of terror, betrayal, greed and violence. As this sensational case for which the murderer has been executed is reopened when a second victim is claimed, D.I Faro is drawn into the shady underworld beyond Victorian middle-class Edinburgh's theatres and salons.
author: Alanna Knight
